name: Hunonic
0:
”Alexa, turn on the light”
”Alexa, turn off the light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Hunonic is an ecosystem of smart home devices. When you connect to Hunonic, you can control smart devices via Alexa speakers with familiar voice commands. You can control the opening and closing of roller shutters, turn on and off lights, etc. Your home will become smarter and more convenient than ever.
